title: All Set For HR Focus Conference
text:
Business & Finance | 7 August 2015 16:50 CET All Set For HR Focus Conference By Daily Guide 
Speakers for the HR Focus Conference and Awards 2015 are all set to make enlightening and thought-provoking presentations at the Clarity 4D HR Forum and Edkins Career Development session. 
Victor & Victors and Edkins Corporate Training will make their presentation from 8-9 October, 2015. 
Speaking on the topic, 'Best You, Better Team,' Victor & Victors from Zambia will bring on board a fresh perspective on 'knowing yourself better, identifying areas of potential growth and how to develop in a team. 
Edkins Corporate Training from UK, on the other hand, will be speaking on the topic, 'Becoming a True Learning Organization - Mindset, Technology and Leadership' at the Clarity 4D HR Forum and 'How the Right Training will help you get, keep and grow within a job.' 
Rev. Celia Apeagyei Collins from UK will take participants through the concept of leadership and delve deeper into how leaders can bring the best out of their followers. 
Samuel Boafo, HR Director, CAL Bank Limited and representatives from ACCA and L'AINE Services Limited will also speak at the Edkins Career Development Session. 
The HR Focus Conference and Awards 2015 will give organizations the opportunity to showcase some of their recruitment processes, products and services. 
The HR Focus Exhibition would also take place at the Banquet Hall, State House alongside the HR Forum and career development session. 
A Business Desk report
